name: Full Beard
tips: Let it grow evenly for 3-4 weeks; ask for a clean neckline two fingers above the Adam's apple.

name: Goatee
tips: Keep the cheeks clean; define the chin outline with a sharp edge.

name: Stubble
tips: Agree on a guard length; keep the neckline tidy and follow the jawline.

name: Van Dyke
tips: Separate the mustache and chin; keep cheeks and jaw clean.

name: Ducktail
description: Pointed beard shaped like a duck tail
tips: Blend the sides toward a point; keep the mustache neat.

name: Verdi
description: Full beard with curled mustache tips
tips: Maintain length on the beard; curl the tips with wax and keep edges tidy.

name: French Fork
description: Long beard split into two points
tips: Grow length first; ask for a clean split and tidy sides.

name: Garibaldi
tips: Let it grow full; round the bottom and keep the neckline clean.

name: Beardstache
description: Prominent mustache with minimal chin beard
tips: Keep the beard short; let the mustache stay fuller and combed.

name: Balbo
tips: Define the chin strap cleanly; keep the mustache disconnected.

name: Anchor
tips: Outline the jaw to a point; keep the soul patch connected.

name: Chevron
tips: Trim to the lip line; keep thickness even across the width.

name: Handlebar
tips: Keep the ends longer; use mustache wax and curl upward.

name: Pencil Stache
tips: Shave above and below for a thin line; keep edges crisp.

name: Hipster
tips: Keep volume on the beard; brush downward and trim cheek lines.

name: Friendly Mutton Chops
description: Full cheek whiskers with clean chin
tips: Keep the chin clean; blend sideburns into cheek whiskers.

name: Circle Beard
tips: Connect mustache and chin; keep the circle symmetrical.

name: Pointed Full Beard
description: Pointed full beard with clean lines
tips: Taper into a point; keep edges sharp and even.

name: Extended Goatee
tips: Extend the chin length; keep cheeks clean and lines sharp.

name: Short Beard
tips: Use a uniform guard length; define cheek and neck lines.

name: Designer Stubble
tips: Set a consistent guard; clean the neckline for contrast.

name: Ducktail Goatee
description: Pointed goatee shaped like duck tail
tips: Blend the goatee into a point; keep cheeks clean.

name: Styled Beard
description: Full beard with beard oil and styling
tips: Apply beard oil; brush to shape and tame flyaways.

name: Trimmed & Shaped
description: Neatly trimmed beard with sharp lines
tips: Ask for a defined cheek line; keep the neckline crisp.
